meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or best selection.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared the choicest ingredients for the special dinner.
meanings.sent2: She picked out the choicest apples from the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The cat chose the choicest spot on the sunny windowsill to nap.
meanings.sent4: The artist selected the choicest colors to paint the vibrant sunset.
meanings.sent5: The students were thrilled to receive the choicest awards for their hard work.

meanings.sent1: The collector displayed his choicest stamps in a special album.
meanings.sent2: He wore his choicest tie to the important job interview.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hid its choicest acorns in a secret stash.
meanings.sent4: The detective found the choicest clues that led to the criminal's capture.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully tended to the choicest flowers in the greenhouse.
